Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
@Emil  Explorer is showing the correct value
don't use the old version of Agama
Verus version of Agama is safe to use, but doesn't have RFOX yet (they might add it in the future)
Currently, you need to use Native mode(qt-wallet) to move RFOX: https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/articles/29000029971-launching-pirate-rfox-and-other-assetchains-in-komodo-ocean-mac-
If you don't need to move them, just backup the seed and wait for a lite wallet to be available: either in Verus-Agama or a wallet by RFOX team

Content:
Hello everyone, our dev @Asher posted a new release  for Agama:
https://github.com/VerusCoin/Agama/releases/tag/v0.5.7-1
This release fixes the following:
```
Fixed Zaddex native launch
Fixed bug where send button was disabled with high immature balances
Fixed bug that prevented pasting wallet seeds
Updated logos for some coins.
Removed coins with non-working electrum servers
Fixed bug that caused erc20 tokens to show mining options.
```

Author: TheFalseProfit#5929
Content: "use Verus Agama instead. back up your wallet.dat file(s) and privkeys and delete old Agama wallet @TheFalseProfit"

Author: TheFalseProfit#5929
Content: Where are my wallet.dat file(s) and privkeys? I have seed words, address, WIF key, wallet name and PIN.

Author: TheFalseProfit#5929
Content: If I upgrade to versus agama BEFORE the claims process do the transactions from the 5th and dust sent by kmd team still show up? Is my upgraded versus wallet OK to then use as the new address?

Author: ùôäùôûùô£ùô†#3612
Content:
Check `%appdata%/komodo` and its subfolders for wallet.dat files. Make sure to backup them in a logical place if you have more coins (each coin has a separate wallet.dat). If no wallet.dat files are present, you most likely used only lite mode.
Your wallet.dat file contains info about the addresses that work on Verus Agama just as they did on Komodo Agama, so your balance (including dust) will show up.
Verus Agama is safe to use for your new address.

Author: TheFalseProfit#5929
Content: I used only lite mode... does that alter anything?

Author: ùôäùôûùô£ùô†#3612
Content: No, just don‚Äôt bother with looking for wallet.dat. Most important is that you have the data you mentioned (Privkey is also known as WIF)
